Uses of Package
com.arbibot.core.entities

Packages that use com.arbibot.core.entities
Package
Description
com.arbibot.core.entities
Contains the entities involved in the use cases.
com.arbibot.core.exceptions
Contains all the exceptions used in the arbitbot-core
com.arbibot.core.ports.input
Contains the interfaces specifying the input ports methods.
com.arbibot.core.ports.output
Contains the interfaces specifying the output ports methods.
com.arbibot.core.usecases.arbitrage
Contains the arbitrage use cases.
  • Classes in com.arbibot.core.entities used by com.arbibot.core.entities
    Class
    Description
    Asset
    The Asset class represents a financial asset in the domain.
    ExchangeType
    Enumerates the different types of exchange.
    OrderStatus
    Enumerates the different possible status for an order.
    OrderType
    Enumerates the different types of order.
    Pair
    The Pair class represents a trading pair consisting of two financial assets.

    Description
    Exchange
    The Exchange class represents the exchange entity.
    Order
